name: Turned On Tech 01 - Wacom Cintiq
description: A fun series exploring the lascivious side of technology. Everyone loves to use the latest tech, but this series of work focusses on how the tech likes to be used. What better piece of tech to start with than one of my tools of the trade. (copyright) Alternative Aesthetics. For personal non-commercial use only. Find me on Instagram and Twitter @alt_aesthetics
